titles.title: A bill to provide for a special application of section 1034 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
A bill to provide for a special application of section 1034 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Provides for extension of the period allowed for rollover of gain on the sale of a principal residence of a named individual.
